nodes.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
nodes.title: Sook Store Builder - Retail space as a service, by the hour, with video-walls!
nodes.author: Sarel van Baalen

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!

nodes.excerpt: It's been a long 2020, eh? 🥵 Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. 🚀
nodes.title: Kudosbot - Your friendly neighbourhood kudos spreader.
nodes.author: Nikhil Gurnani

localize.description: 这是一个漫长的2020年，嗯？🥵 有时候，感谢一个人对你的帮助是远远不够的。在公共Slack频道里给他们发个 "赞"，和大家一起分享他们的精彩，传播一点正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好邻居的赞誉传播者。

localize.description: 這是一個漫長的2020年，嗯？🥵 有時候，感謝一個人對你的幫助是遠遠不夠的。在公共Slack頻道里給他們發個 "贊"，和大家一起分享他們的精彩，傳播一點正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好鄰居的讚譽傳播者。

localize.description: Resume Work帮助数以千计的求职者创建一份值得信赖的简历。有了Impact，您将得到一份快速、精心设计的求职简历。

nodes.excerpt: Just a curated list of the best games to play on your next video call Built during another lockdown in the UK, hopefully these games get you through your next awkward work social as they have for us... By https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/, illustrations by https://craftwork.design/

nodes.excerpt: ZelaaPayAE crypto cards allow for transactions online and in brick-and-mortar establishments at market rates, backed by our cryptocurrency ZPAE. With the ZPAYae card, you can immediately exchange fiat to crypto and then pay directly for your goods or send it to a friend.
nodes.title: ZPAE Crypto Card - Pay with ZPAE Card around the world at 40,000,000+ merchants
nodes.author: Vishal Sharma

localize.description: ZelaaPayAE加密卡可以按市场价格在网上和实体店进行交易，由我们的加密货币ZPAE支持。使用ZPAYae卡，您可以立即将货币兑换成加密货币，然后直接支付货款或发送给朋友。
localize.tagline: 在全球40,000,000+商户使用ZPAE卡支付。

localize.description: ZelaaPayAE加密卡可以按市場價格在網上和實體店進行交易，由我們的加密貨幣ZPAE支持。使用ZPAYae卡，您可以立即將貨幣兌換成加密貨幣，然後直接支付貨款或發送給朋友。
localize.tagline: 在全球40,000,000+商戶使用ZPAE卡支付。

nodes.excerpt: Use https://pudding.ai/ for real-time ad creative analysis to maximize your campaign ROI and work efficiency. Get actionable, data-driven AI insights 💡 for all your ad creatives and bridge the gap by ensuring great communication between your creative & media teams.
nodes.title: Pudding.ai - Real-time feedback for your ad creatives
nodes.author: Dina Taitelbaum

localize.description: 使用https://pudding.ai/，进行实时广告创意分析，以最大限度地提高您的广告活动投资回报率和工作效率。为您的所有广告创意获取可操作的、数据驱动的AI洞察力💡，并通过确保您的创意和媒体团队之间的巨大沟通来弥补差距。
localize.tagline: 为您的广告创意提供实时反馈

localize.description: 使用https://pudding.ai/，進行實時廣告創意分析，以最大限度地提高您的廣告活動投資回報率和工作效率。爲您的所有廣告創意獲取可操作的、數據驅動的AI洞察力💡，並通過確保您的創意和媒體團隊之間的巨大溝通來彌補差距。
localize.tagline: 爲您的廣告創意提供實時反饋

nodes.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
nodes.title: Pickle - Transcribe and analyze phone and video conversations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Pickle帮助企业了解他们与客户的每一次电话和视频对话。我们通过自动转录电话并提取关键见解、问题和趋势来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 抄录和分析电话和视频对话。

localize.description: Pickle幫助企業瞭解他們與客戶的每一次電話和視頻對話。我們通過自動轉錄電話並提取關鍵見解、問題和趨勢來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 抄錄和分析電話和視頻對話。

nodes.excerpt: Threadletter allows converting a Revue newsletter to a Twitter thread in seconds. Enter the Revue API key, select the issue, and publish the thread via Chirr App or copy-paste to Twitter.
nodes.title: Threadletter - Convert Revue newsletter to Twitter thread in seconds
nodes.author: Sasha Koss

localize.description: Threadletter允许在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter主题。输入Revue的API密钥，选择问题，并通过Chirr App或复制粘贴到Twitter发布线程。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter线程

localize.description: Threadletter允許在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter主題。輸入Revue的API密鑰，選擇問題，並通過Chirr App或複製粘貼到Twitter發佈線程。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter線程

nodes.excerpt: Instantly create a mockup for any website. Paste the page URL and instantly generate a wireframe image of the site or your favorite websites in full-page resolution (3000 x 2000 pixels) with the background color of your choice.

localize.description: 即时为任何网站创建一个模拟图。粘贴页面URL，并立即生成网站或您最喜爱的网站的线框图像，全页分辨率（3000 x 2000像素），背景颜色由您选择。
localize.tagline: 即时为任何网站创建一个模拟图。

nodes.excerpt: Wyndly gives people with allergies lifelong relief. We ship you personalized oral allergy drops that train your immune system to beat your personal allergy triggers. With unlimited doctor access and at-home care, we’ve made allergy care convenient.
nodes.title: Wyndly - Train your immune system to beat your allergies
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Wyndly让过敏症患者得到终生缓解。我们为您运送个性化的口服过敏滴剂，训练您的免疫系统来击败您个人的过敏触发器。通过无限制的医生访问和上门护理，我们让过敏护理变得更加方便。
localize.tagline: 训练您的免疫系统以击败您的过敏症

localize.tagline: 訓練您的免疫系統以擊敗您的過敏症

nodes.excerpt: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.

nodes.excerpt: The way we build and use products is changing faster than ever before. To succeed, it’s essential to know what’s coming next. We surveyed thousands of Product leaders to distill the most important trends and insights you need to know as we enter 2021. Enjoy!
nodes.title: Future of Product Management Report 2021 - This is the best time in history to build digital products🚀

localize.tagline: 这是历史上打造数字产品的最好时机🚀。

nodes.excerpt: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
nodes.title: PowerFarm - Orchestrate and manage your tests in the cloud.
nodes.author: Wojtek Smajda

localize.description: PowerFarm平台可以让您在云端运行和协调Selenium和移动测试。它可以快速、彻底地监控结果，并确保与存储库或其他平台顺利集成。通过加入我们的早期访问计划了解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在云端协调和管理您的测试。

localize.tagline: 免費庫存視頻爲創作者。無需歸屬。

nodes.excerpt: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
nodes.title: Covalent - Interactive icebreakers for remote teams
nodes.author: Arek Der-Sarkissian

localize.description: Covalent通过互动式在线破冰，帮助远程团队建立更好的联系。开始很简单：(1)找到一位朋友并访问我们的网站(2)按右上角的 "开始连接"(3)按 "主机 "然后按 "播放"。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的互动破冰

nodes.excerpt: PowerRouter is a powerful and easy way to route sales leads to the right salesperson in Salesforce with smart rules you setup in advance. You can build lead/contact distribution rules 10x faster without writing any code.

nodes.excerpt: Gemini 2 detects duplicate and similar files in every corner of your Mac, including Photos, Music, and even external drives. And helps you free up tons of disk space. Plus, now it spots new copies right away so that they won’t pile up again.
nodes.title: Duplicates Monitor by Gemini 2 - Keep your Mac duplicate-free at all times
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 双子座2可以检测到你Mac的每个角落里的重复和类似文件，包括照片、音乐，甚至是外部驱动器。并帮助你释放大量的磁盘空间。此外，现在它能立即发现新的副本，以免它们再次堆积。
localize.tagline: 让你的 Mac 始终保持无复制状态

localize.description: 雙子座2可以檢測到你Mac的每個角落裏的重複和類似文件，包括照片、音樂，甚至是外部驅動器。並幫助你釋放大量的磁盤空間。此外，現在它能立即發現新的副本，以免它們再次堆積。
localize.tagline: 讓你的 Mac 始終保持無複製狀態

nodes.excerpt: Gleek.io is a diagram maker focused on speed ⏱ - typing code is much faster than drag-and-drop - for developers, it is more natural to write than to draw - generate a diagram with connections Create your first diagram in Gleek.io & write your feedback 🙏

nodes.excerpt: A complete set of 4350 relaxed and comfortable icons. Plumpy style icons are modern with a bit of retro flair featuring heavily-rounded corners and a two-tone color style. • Modern two-tone colors • Friendly rounded styling • Scales and recolors well
nodes.title: Plumpy Icons - 4350 modern and friendly duotone icons by Icons8

localize.tagline: 4350个现代和友好的双色调图标由Icons8提供。

localize.description: 一套完整的4350個輕鬆舒適的圖標。Plumpy風格的圖標是現代與一點復古的風格，具有重圓角和雙色風格。- 現代的雙色調顏色 - 友好的圓角造型 - 良好的縮放和重新着色能力。
localize.tagline: 4350個現代和友好的雙色調圖標由Icons8提供。

nodes.excerpt: Career Emails is a collection of great email templates that cover a number of networking situations, including how to ask an industry leader for advice, cold email alumni, follow up with someone, write effective LinkedIn connection request notes, and more!
nodes.title: Networking Emails - 100+ proven email templates to help your career in 2021
nodes.author: Rohan Mahtani

localize.description: 职场邮件》是一套优秀的邮件模板，涵盖了多种人脉关系的情况，包括如何向行业领导请教、给校友发冷邮件、与人跟进、写有效的LinkedIn连接请求说明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的邮件模板，为你的2021年事业发展助力

localize.description: 職場郵件》是一套優秀的郵件模板，涵蓋了多種人脈關係的情況，包括如何向行業領導請教、給校友發冷郵件、與人跟進、寫有效的LinkedIn連接請求說明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的郵件模板，爲你的2021年事業發展助力
